column1: 27070,War of Kings: Ascension (2009) #3,3,23671,93,"A WAR OF KINGS TIE-IN! The true purpose of Darkhawk...finally revealed! But is this sinister secret more than Chris Powell-or the entire galaxy-can take? Can he rise to greatness, or will this crushing weight pull Darkhawk down into the abyss? It's shocks aplenty from the storyline CBR.com calls ""...an angst-filled adventure that will have repercussions for months to come""! Rated T  ...$3.99",,
